searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: food | medication | environment | biologic

searchParam.name: clinical-status
searchParam.documentation: active | inactive | resolved

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Code that identifies the allergy or intolerance

searchParam.name: manifestation
searchParam.documentation: Clinical symptoms/signs associated with the Event

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who the sensitivity is for

searchParam.name: severity
searchParam.documentation: mild | moderate | severe (of event as a whole)

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: clinical-status
searchParam.documentation: The clinical status of the condition

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Code for the condition

searchParam.name: onset-age
searchParam.documentation: Onsets as age or age range

searchParam.name: onset-date
searchParam.documentation: Date related onsets (dateTime and Period)

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Who has the condition?

searchParam.name: recorded-date
searchParam.documentation: Date record was first recorded

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: Who has the condition?

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code for the report, as opposed to codes for the atomic results, which are the names on the observation resource referred to from the result

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: The Encounter when the order was made

searchParam.name: issued
searchParam.documentation: When the report was issued

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the report if a patient

searchParam.name: result
searchParam.documentation: Link to an atomic result (observation resource)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject of the report

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: A date within the period the Encounter lasted

searchParam.name: location
searchParam.documentation: Location the encounter takes place

searchParam.name: participant
searchParam.documentation: Persons involved in the encounter other than the patient

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient or group present at the encounter

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The patient or group present at the encounter

searchParam.name: type
searchParam.documentation: Specific type of encounter

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Time period when flag is active

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a subject to list flags for

searchParam.name: managing-entity
searchParam.documentation: Entity that is the custodian of the Group's definition

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The patient for the vaccination record

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: address-city
searchParam.documentation: A city specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-country
searchParam.documentation: A country specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-postalcode
searchParam.documentation: A postal code specified in an address

searchParam.name: address-state
searchParam.documentation: A state specified in an address

searchParam.name: name
searchParam.documentation: A portion of the location's name or alias

searchParam.name: partof
searchParam.documentation: A location of which this location is a part

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Returns medications for a specific code

searchParam.name: form
searchParam.documentation: Returns medications for a specific dose form

searchParam.name: ingredient-code
searchParam.documentation: Returns medications for this ingredient code

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: context
searchParam.documentation: Returns dispenses with a specific context (episode or episode of care)

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list dispenses  for

searchParam.name: prescription
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a prescription to list dispenses from

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient for whom to list dispenses

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: Return prescriptions of this medication code

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Return prescriptions with this encounter identifier

searchParam.name: medication
searchParam.documentation: Return prescriptions for this medication reference

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: Returns prescriptions for a specific patient

searchParam.name: requester
searchParam.documentation: Returns prescriptions prescribed by this prescriber

searchParam.name: status
searchParam.documentation: Status of the prescription

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The identity of a patient to list orders  for

searchParam.name: _id
searchParam.documentation: The ID of the resource

searchParam.name: category
searchParam.documentation: The classification of the type of observation

searchParam.name: code
searchParam.documentation: The code of the observation type

searchParam.name: date
searchParam.documentation: Obtained date/time. If the obtained element is a period, a date that falls in the period

searchParam.name: encounter
searchParam.documentation: Encounter related to the observation

searchParam.name: has-member
searchParam.documentation: Related resource that belongs to the Observation group

searchParam.name: patient
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about (if patient)

searchParam.name: subject
searchParam.documentation: The subject that the observation is about

searchParam.name: value-concept
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a CodeableConcept

searchParam.name: value-date
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a date or period of time

searchParam.name: value-quantity
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a Quantity, or a SampledData (just search on the bounds of the values in sampled data)

searchParam.name: value-string
searchParam.documentation: The value of the observation, if the value is a string, and also searches in CodeableConcept.text

searchParam.documentation: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text
